Plot: Features one of the strangest characters in literature, Joseph Balsamo, also known as Cagliostro (later a key figure in the Affair of the Necklace). An alchemist, conspirator, and Freemason, Balsamo figures prominently in the eventual downfall of the French monarchy.
Characters: Marie Antoinette, Andrée de Taverney, Philippe de Taverney Maison Rouge, Louis XV of France, Louis XVI of France, Gilbert, Madame du Barry, Louis, duke of Richelieu, Jean-Jacques Rousseau, Cagliostro
